events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking info hasn’t updated in several days, and I’m really concerned about the delay.
The customer's message contains keywords related to late shipping and tracking issues, categorizing this case under Delivery Delay.
Assigning the case to the delivery support team to investigate the shipping delay reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your order. I’m here to help you check the status and figure out what’s causing the delay.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the name the order was placed under? This will help me locate your shipment more quickly.
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and it was under the name John Smith. Please let me know what you find out.
Thank you for the info. We checked with the courier and found there was an unexpected delay at the local shipping center. Your package should arrive within the next 3 business days.
Thanks for the update and the explanation. I appreciate you looking into this for me and letting me know when to expect my delivery.
We’re glad we could clarify the situation. Your order is now expected to arrive shortly. Please don’t hesitate to contact us if there are further issues.
Just wanted to follow up and confirm that your package was delivered successfully. Let us know if you need any more help!
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience, and we hope you enjoy your purchase once it arrives.
